cause.description:
i have noticed that lots of peopel have lots of misconceptions about islam. So i'm here with a group of other people who are goign to help and spread the true and real islam becuase the prophet(may peace be upon him) said "tell people about me even if it was somehting small" so i want as many people as possible to help us promote and spread islam
1. spread and promote islam
2. teach people about islam
3. remove all types of misconceptions
cause.mission: PROMOTE AND SPREAD THE REAL AND TRUE ISLAM
cause.name: THE TRUE ISLAM
